definition: To experience an increase in weight or size, typically used to describe the process of gaining physical mass.

examples.german: Ich nehme zu, wenn ich zu viel esse.
examples.english: I gain weight when I eat too much.

examples.german: Sie hat in den letzten Monaten zugenommen.
examples.english: She has gained weight in the last few months.

examples.german: Wenn du regelmäßig Sport treibst, wirst du Muskeln zunehmen.
examples.english: If you exercise regularly, you will gain muscles.

examples.german: Er nimmt immer mehr Verantwortung in seinem Job zu.
examples.english: He is taking on more and more responsibility in his job.
